website_summaries.verdict: The Monster 24K Headphones are a solid purchase for DJs looking to add flashiness to their gear without sacrificing sound quality, but they won't fit everyone so be sure to try them on before buying.
pros: The Monster 24K DJ Headphones carry an aggressive loud sound profile with super-deep bass, and DJs will appreciate the swiveling ear cups and tough design
Everyday listeners can also use the convenient remote and microphone on the cord to control their smartphones
cons: Pricey compared to other DJ-friendly headphones
some users may feel they fit too tightly on their head

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This headphones look awesome and sounds great, if you have the money I would recommend this headphones paired with an amp if you are looking for a more loud and theater feeling sound. I got about 3 years with this headphones and they still look great haven't had problems with them plus they come with a mic cord for calls or gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Edgard

customer_reviews.title: MONSTER = "HOT DAMN!"
customer_reviews.text: "HOT DAMN!" If these ain't the best- darn- tootin' set of headphones I done ever had!" Seriously. Love 'em to death! They look cool and sound even cooler. Worth the price of admission. Makes my vinyl collection sound as if music was a new experience. Do I get a free pair for saying all that great stuff? No matter. I could write a novel regarding this set phones.....but I digress.
customer_reviews.author: albert valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ear pads rip easily and the paint chips No support from Monster Love the sound but hate the durability
customer_reviews.author: Black Legacy

customer_reviews.title: Broken in half headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought these headphones used with the understanding it would be "used ware" but not broken in half this is a joke & scam. No wires for them broken in half headphones either.
customer_reviews.author: F3AZ3L

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME HEADPHONE
customer_reviews.text: This Monster headphone is AWSOME!!!!!! Even this one is more expencive than the ​​normal version, but trust me this one looks really different. The pics can not show how this headphone pretty. And the sound is typical monster feeling.

customer_reviews.title: The sound is impeccable and the swivel is amazing and helpful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas and he literally threw away his Beats by Dre. The sound is impeccable and the swivel is amazing and helpful. I also love the 24K gold finish.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son... Very loud and he loves them!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ear headset
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, matches my style. the sound is great and the moving ear pieces is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only had for 6 months. Only used 3 times ...
customer_reviews.text: Only had for 6 months. Only used 3 times and now the sound has gone out of the right earpiece. Ughhhh😡😡😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Musgrove

customer_reviews.title: Rich, right bass, nice sound overall, BUT, should be more durable for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I purchased a pair of monster 24k as a Christmas present. I'm pretty much satisfied by the sound of those, especially since I'm tinkering with different music Equalizing apps. The big letdown was the durability of the plastic band. I'm babying all of my electronic equipment, but those got extra care since they are dazzling! The thing is that after a couple of weeks the side of the headband, which stretches a bit in order to fit them on your head, started to show cracks on the paint.That messes with the amazing appearance of the headphones, so I'm pretty disappointed in a big brand as Monster!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All gold everything.
customer_reviews.text: Great color and awesome sound quality. Hopefully wireless next time. Match great with my gold MacBook
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING! Way better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Way better than I expected. High price = high quality. Exactly what I was looking for and wanted! A perfect 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Nice but they do lack bass so don't expect the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice but they do lack bass so don't expect the bass to be as strong the beats by dre headphones. Besides that they're beautiful.

customer_reviews.title: I bought these headphones for my grandson for Christmas! ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my grandson for Christmas! He has thanked me for them four times in the last two weeks. He loves them.

customer_reviews.title: It is just over a year and the gold plating has come off showing the white plastic underneath. See photos.
customer_reviews.text: It is just over a year and the gold plating has a defect in it. I comes off very easily, exposing the white plastic underneath on both sides. Very poor quality.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! So Glad i bought these headphones! 100% better quality than beats by dre headphones. Looks great!

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, durable & not cheap material
customer_reviews.text: My husbands Christmas 2014 gift & he loves them! He's had the beats & this far surpass the quality of those!!! Hes always being asked about the headphones & they go everywhere with him! Very sturdy, durable & not cheap material!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best purchase I have made in a while! Truly worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Its my Favorite Headset
customer_reviews.text: Its nice & whatever u be listen the sound be so good

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, sound is ok.
customer_reviews.text: Even though they are made by the same people that make beats, they don't sound nearly as good as beats. But they look really good though. I got them for the look. Lets face it, who doesn't get them for the look.
customer_reviews.author: Djmeechymeech

customer_reviews.title: We typically don't return each other's gifts so these were definitely not good for him
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my boyfriend as a Christmas gift. He said the sound quality was mediocre. He's a DJ. I'm not. Of course, he is used to professional grade headphones-these were for his personal collection. He asked me to return them. We typically don't return each other's gifts so these were definitely not good for him. But, to each his own. Try them for yourself but it's a no from us.
customer_reviews.author: Shadaxoxo

customer_reviews.title: Judge this book by its cover
customer_reviews.text: Visually they're a great looking headphone but sound quality wise ehh. I'm a "basshead" and these really didn't impress me. Honestly the beats by studio (1st gen) give you more of a thump than these. Keep in mind that the two cords that it comes with are going to give you two different sound qualities. The remote talk cord is a joke. The Dj cord is the best but you need a good enough output (macbook pro) to actually get the full potential out of these.
customer_reviews.author: TURNER

customer_reviews.title: Love the headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love the headphones, they are absolutely beautiful and great quality! Received shipment very next day. Great purchase and NO regrets!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like them alot
customer_reviews.text: I really like them alot. but i think they could have been more bass heavy for my taste. overall im satisfied with my purchase. unboxing:

customer_reviews.text: the gold paint was chipped immediately after receiving them and the headband snapped after about two weeks of use. the product is not worth the money.
